data.name: Andre
data.title: Fullstack Software Engineer | Cloud-Native & AI-Powered Systems
data.summary: Multidisciplinary fullstack software engineer with a unique blend of skills across AI/ML integration, DevOps, cloud-native deployments, real-time data systems, and enterprise platform extension (SAP/Salesforce). Experienced in designing and delivering scalable, intelligent SaaS solutions that combine performance, automation, and business impact.

projects.title: TransparAI
projects.purpose: Leverage AI to provide clear, concise analysis of complex legal and technical documents with secure authentication and Stripe-based subscriptions.
projects.impact: Empowered users to quickly grasp complex documents by extracting AI-driven summaries, risk scores, and key clauses, improving decision-making across legal and technical domains.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, responsible for building the frontend UI, integrating the Gemini AI API, implementing secure auth and Stripe subscriptions, and deploying the app to cloud platforms.
features: AI-powered document analysis (summary, scoring, clause extraction)
Secure authentication with Firebase
Stripe-based subscription and quota management
Analysis history and export to PDF for premium users
Responsive and user-friendly dashboard interface

projects.title: PlatformPro Jobs
projects.purpose: A specialized job board connecting platform engineering talent with employers, featuring AI-powered candidate scoring and job description generation.
projects.impact: Streamlined the hiring process for platform engineering roles with AI-assisted tools for recruiters and a dedicated dashboard for candidates to manage applications and profiles.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, responsible for architecting and building the Next.js application, implementing Firebase backend services, integrating Genkit for AI features, setting up Stripe payments, Cloudinary for file storage, and deploying the application.
features: Dedicated dashboards for both recruiters and candidates
AI-powered CV analysis and candidate scoring
AI-assisted job description generation for recruiters
Comprehensive job and application management tools
Stripe integration for job posting credits

projects.title: Freemap
projects.purpose: A platform designed to connect users based on location and facilitate real-time communication through video calls. It enables users to create profiles, discover others on a map, and engage in direct video interactions.
projects.impact: Facilitated community building and direct interaction by combining location-based discovery with real-time video communication for social networking or shared interests.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, implemented the Node.js/Express backend, integrated real-time communication via Socket.io and Jitsi, and developed the React frontend with mapping.
features: Location-based User Discovery on a map (Leaflet)
Real-time Video Calling (Jitsi integration) & Signaling (Socket.io)
User Authentication and Profile Management
Image Uploads for profiles using Cloudinary
Protected Routes and Search functionality

projects.title: Digital Starter
projects.purpose: A web application designed to provide a structured digital learning or onboarding experience, guiding users through various phases with integrated AI assistance and progress tracking.
projects.impact: Streamlined user onboarding with a multi-phase guided journey, AI-powered assistance for enhanced engagement, and personalized progress tracking to improve completion rates.
features: Multi-phase guided user onboarding experience
Integrated AI assistant for real-time help
Comprehensive user authentication & profile management
Personalized progress tracking dashboard
Secure authenticated routes and contact form

workExperience.title: IT Support & Python Development (Apprentice)
workExperience.subtitle: HDI France, Paris
workExperience.description:
• Provided Level 1 & 2 technical support, managing user incidents for hardware, network, and software issues via GLPI.
  • Modernized and maintained legacy Python scripts, focusing on performance optimization, bug fixes, and code readability.
  • Developed automation scripts to streamline document exports, improving data accessibility and workflow efficiency.
  • Managed the IT asset lifecycle, including deployment, configuration, and network administration for user workstations and meeting room hardware (ClickShare).

workExperience.title: Developer Intern
workExperience.subtitle: FEDHUBS, Remote
workExperience.description: Developed a Python-based web scraper using BeautifulSoup to automate data extraction. Optimized SEO and performance for a Laravel and React/TypeScript site, improving loading strategies and asset compression.
